## RumInitConfiguration.defaultPrivacyLevel property

Allow to protect end user privacy and prevent sensitive organizational information from being collected. mask See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/session_replay/browser/privacy_options">Replay Privacy Options</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
defaultPrivacyLevel?: DefaultPrivacyLevel | undefined;
```
